name: CPGActivityTypeCS
title: CPG Activity Type Code System
description: A type of activity that can be performed as part of the delivery of guideline-based care.

concept.definition: The activity of communicating a particular message to a patient
The task of collecting information from a patient using a specified questionnaire
The task of ordering or prescribing a particular medication to a patient
The task of dispensing a particular medication to a patient
The task of administering a particular medication to a patient
The task of documenting use of a particular medication by a patient
The task of recommending a particular immunization for a patient
The activity of ordering or performing a particular service

concept.display: Enroll in a pathway or strategy
concept.definition: The activity of enrolling or unenrolling a patient in a particular pathway or strategy

concept.display: Generate a metric or case report
concept.definition: The activity of generating a metric, measure, or case report
The activity of proposing a particular diagnosis
The activity of reporting or recording a specific detected issue
The activity of making and reporting or recording a particular inference
The activity of reporting or recording a particular flag
